answers.answer: And im only 26wks!!!..wont be 27 wks intill tuesday!!
Ask the doctor if you can be checked for Lyme Disease.
Lyme Disease???.....What is that. im freaking out now!!!

It might not be in your area of the world.  It is just that it is characterized by people being achy and tired.  It comes from the bite of a very tiny tick, and those ticks are in the woods in certain parts of the U.S. (and some people get it from walking in tall grass, so I guess the ticks can live there too).  It was just a suggestion based on your symptoms.  Epstein-Barr is another one that presents with tiredness and aches as a main set of symptoms.I would definitely go see my doctor whether or not you think you're suffering from a  disease, since it might just be a hormone imbalance or something relating to the pregnancy that he can do something about.  I'd go see the doc this week -- if you won't do it for yourself, do it because your kids are needing you to be healthy.

Sounds like you are overworked, and it is taking a toll on you because you are pregnant.  I am pregnant with number 3, and i have 2 boys ( 2 and 4).  My husband is not the most helpful in the house, unless you call leaving your clothes on the floor helpful.  So, on top of all I have to do for the boys and the house i am pregnant and tired.  most of the day i feel so terrable i have to lay down.Sounds like your body needs a rest (if you are like me, you don't have that option).  Try to get to go for a massage, can you get out for that.Sounds more like you have no help.  If that is the case, I understand.  Do you get to nap at all?
With the headaches and blurry vision, it sounds like you may have preeclampsia/toxemia.

I was thinking the same as cutiemama. A friend of mine had similar symptoms at around 30 weeks and she had to have an emergency c section. (Not meaning to worry you) but I would go to the Dr's asap and get your blood pressure checked.Ruth xx
i agree with cutiemama it really sounds like you have pre eclampsia and it is serious i would go to the doctor straight away,

I was in so much pain too with my last pregnancy.  I did get a break though, I only chased after one kiddo, he was 3 at the time.  I also worked full time, but honestly, even though it was tough to get up and get us out the door every morning, it was still easier than being at home chasing my son.  My DH doesn't do much around the house either, well, he does the outdoor work, and he does cook 'cuz I suck at it.  I had hte hardest time trying to bathe my son, leaning over the tub with a big belly.  I'm also a neat freak and was forever cleaning.  You poor thing, you need a day off!  You should also call your Dr. ASAP, headaches and blurry vision are a bad sign, don't wait till your next appt.  I agee with the other glas, best to be safe and call the oncall Dr. or go in to be checked.  Then you should try to put your feet up and give yourself some time off.  BTW, do you know what you are having?  Just curious, I have 2 boys and joke that I just have to stop having babies when we hit the magic number, as I can't see that I will ever get a girl.  Everywhere I look I see families of 3 boys...my oldest son just asked me for another brother last weekend and keeps talking about how there will be 3 boys in the house.  It's cute, but 2 boys are so much work already!  Hope you feel better.

Hey ladies..Thanks soo much for all the comments it does help out alot, today my body hasnt been hurting as much as it has in the last 7 days, but the headaches and back pain has gone no where, not too mention i now i have pain in the lower part of my left side..And having a hard time breathing hasnt gotton no easier on me, my hubby and kids just think i have the flu and dont wanna take me serious, today when my daughter  asked me where i was going it just came out of my mouth too sleep and never too wake up, i just feel horrible!!..Nevethless too say i never get any free time, because kevin works from midnight too noon the next day and then sleeps, soo im taking care of kids 24/7, and when it comes too bathing them, i feel soo worthless like i cant because it hurts soo bad too bend over, and then i get short of breath!!...The headaches are really getting too me, in the last week i think ive aten a total of 4 times, because the headaches makes me feel like im gonna get sick, soo i dont feel like eating...My doctors appointment is on the 25th, im tryin too told off intill then too go in, at every appointment my blood pressure has been good, soo i dont know what is going on with me, but just readin these comments, have givin me a headche and im startin too get dizzy with bluzy vision once again...soo im gonna close for now, thanks for the comments ladies and keep them up please!!..i will update again later
Oh...i forgot too add.....tooo Critter, i have a 7yr old daughter, and two sons, one 3 and the other 2, and other little BOY on the way.....

Baby4 - is it sort of typical for your to exaggerate illnesses?If it's not,  and you usually judge soldier on without complaining when you are sick,  I think you need to go to the emergency room.Since none of us on this board know you,  its hard to say exactly what is going on.  I have some friends I would just kind of take with a grain of salt if they were exaggerating an illness,  and some friends I would believe actually were dying.The thought that comes to mind is viral meningitis.  Can you put your chin to your chest comfortably?Best wishes.
Sorry for the typos.   : (   I was typing really fast and didn't proofread.  I hope you can still understand what I'm saying.Best wishes.

I knew it!  Boys come in 3's!  I so know that my next one will be a little boy.  If the headache isn't from the bp, then I bet it's from chasing after the boys.  I have a 4 year old and a 5 & 1/2 month old and the bigger one wears me out!  I'm sure soon enough both will be on the run.  I hope you're getting some rest and feel better soon.  When I'm exhausted, I get bad headaches.  I would call the Dr. on Monday though and tell them what's going on, and get some rest, who cares what the otehrs think, they aren't pregnant.  My DH also thought I wasn't in full blown labor and then told me my contractions weren't bad when I was being induced and had back labor.  Contractions would peak, dip then peak again, not even a minute apart...when the nurses came in concerned about my hyperstimulated uterus, he felt bad.  Since I wasn't complaining loudly about it, he just thought I was feeling fine and was whining for attention.  When I began to throw up and shake from it, my Dr. came in and they had to turn down the pitocin to get it under control.  He had no idea how bad it was until then, they are kinda clueless if tehy can't physically see it.  Take care of yourslef and the little one.  The other little ones will be okay if you lay down for an hour.  I would snuggle up with mine and watch Spongebob.  I would drift off to sleep and he enjoyed the time we had together.  I know it's easier said than done, but just a thought.

question: Hi there Ladies,this past week, has been the worst of my entire 27 yrs of life!!!..Serouisly this is my 4th pregancie and i have never ever felt like this, i dont know what is wrong with me, but i serouisly feel like im Dying!!..I have three kids at home right now, and its been tough, with tryin too keep the house clean, feed them bath them, and tend too them everymin of the day!!...Since my hubby works night and sleeps all day!!..Ive been hurting, my entire body hurts, from morning to night, i thought maybe i might have had the flu or something, but its been all week, and i dont feel an inch better, im hurting anywhere from headaches, that i cant even touch my hair without it feeling like my head is gonna fall off, and my vision, gets blury, ive got some of the worst back and leg pains its just not desricblable...I have a doctors appointment on the 25th and hoping i feel better then.....Can any of you ladies out there, tell me if you think something serouisly might be wrong with me, im going on like 2 hours of sleep a night, because i cant never sleep cause of the back pain and leg pains!!!...Please i feel like im dying!!
title: I feel like im Dying Ladies!!
